sentences.en: He climbed the ladder in defiance of the warning.
sentences.cn: 他无视警告爬上了那架梯子.

sentences.en: He read through her eager defiance to the guilty truth.
sentences.cn: 他从她迫切的反抗里看出了她犯罪的事实.

sentences.en: He slammed the door in a spirit of defiance.
sentences.cn: 他以挑衅性的态度把门砰地一下关上.

sentences.en: He will never set you at defiance or willfully injure you.
sentences.cn: 他决不会违抗你,或者存心伤害你.

sentences.en: Lewis cynical defiance of federal authority was more than Congress would tolerate.
sentences.cn: 刘易斯对联邦权威的极端蔑视,使国会再也无法容忍.

sentences.en: Pain replied to the prosecution by defiance and inflammatory speeches.
sentences.cn: 潘恩用蔑视和煽动性的演说对付起诉.

sentences.en: She acted in defiance of my orders.
sentences.cn: 她无视我的命令行动了.

sentences.en: The crowd mingled defiance and anguish in an animal roar.
sentences.cn: 群众立即响起了一片充满蔑视和愤恨的吼声.

sentences.en: The outlaw pulled out a dagger and bade defiance to the policemen.
sentences.cn: 那名歹徒拔出匕首,悍然与警察对抗.

sentences.en: Their love of life comes in spite of, almost in defiance of, considerable hardship.
sentences.cn: 尽管面临众多的艰难困苦，他们还是几乎义无反顾地表现出了对生活的热爱。

sentences.en: There was a look of defiance in his eyes.
sentences.cn: 他眼里流露出寻衅的凶光.
他们以轻蔑的眼光瞪着我.

sentences.en: Thousands of people have taken to the streets in defiance of the curfew.
sentences.cn: 成千上万的人不顾宵禁涌上街头。

sentences.en: Unwillingly she met his eyes, defiance and perturbation on her face.
sentences.cn: 她极不情愿地看着他的眼睛, 满脸反抗和烦乱的神色.

sentences.en: went on strike in defiance of union policy.
sentences.cn: 不顾工会政策举行罢工

sentences.en: With such precautions the courtiers might bid defiance to contagion.
sentences.cn: 由于采取了这些预防措施,侍臣们根本不必担心传染.

words.tran_cn: 挑衅的；目中无人的，蔑视的；挑战的

trans.tran_en: behaviour that shows you refuse to do what someone tells you to do, especially because you do not respect them
